Package draw.view

GUI classes for application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawingPalette
    Represents the top-level Boundary object in the application.
    DrawingPanel  

Package draw.view Description

GUI classes for application.

A single DrawingPalette window that presents ability for user to create shapes and select them.

  1. DrawingPalette -- The JFrame window.
  2. DrawingPanel -- Panel inside of which elements are drawn.
Since:
1.0
